title: I am still here to protest the Fiora rework
body:
I am the World's greatest Fiora of all time.

Riot ruined my main when they did the Fiora rework.

I am still upset about it. 

I think everyone who actually played the champ well misses the old Fiora game play.

I think that changing Fiora like that ruined the 1st E-sport. 

It certainly did for me.

I don't think you should change champs to be a completely different champ like that. 

My main complaints is that her Lunge and her ultimate are totally different. 

Fiora's lunge and her ultimate were what made Fiora...  Fiora. 

Everyone who down voted me and everyone who likes the new Fiora better doesn't play Fiora like I do. 

I have more games with Fiora than all of you combined. 

I am the World's best Fiora.  I will NEVER be OK with the rework. 

I want Riot to change it back. 

I am only here because I am dedicated and still care about Fiora.

Someone in my last game were talking about how they used to main Fiora and quit playing her after the rework. 

It wasn't just a new skin to us who actually play her.

You ruined the game and it will always be ruined until you change it back.

replies.body:
>I am the World's greatest Fiora of all time.

No you aren't.

>Riot ruined my main when they did the Fiora rework.

Most people agree it is better.

>I am still upset about it.

We can tell.

>I think everyone who actually played the champ well misses the old Fiora game play.

Not really.

>I think that changing Fiora like that ruined the 1st E-sport.

League wasn't the first E-sport by a long shot (as in we had e-sports over 40 years ago)

>It certainly did for me.

Yeah, we get it.

>I don't think you should change champs to be a completely different champ like that.

She is the same thematic.  Her gameplay was made to be much healthier though.

>My main complaints is that her Lunge and her ultimate are totally different.

Wow, instead of a point and click that could be cast twice if the first hit it is a semi-targetted that refunds most of the CD if it hits.  So different, definitely not strong now that you can jump walls with it.

Her ult was also an incredibly toxic and unfair ability to play against.  There wasn't any counterplay to it.

>Fiora's lunge and her ultimate were what made Fiora... Fiora.

Lunge is still pretty much the same, ult is different but far healthier.

>Everyone who down voted me and everyone who likes the new Fiora better doesn't play Fiora like I do.

You are right, we play Fiora.  You play a dream of what Fiora used to be.

>I have more games with Fiora than all of you combined.

No you don't.  Looking at your profile you have barely 10% of the mastery points of ImCreepingDeath on Fiora.

>I am the World's best Fiora. I will NEVER be OK with the rework.

No you aren't and that is probably true.

>I want Riot to change it back.

Yeah we get it.  You can stop posting about it because it isn't going to happen.

>I am only here because I am dedicated and still care about Fiora.

Then play and enjoy the new Fiora.

>Someone in my last game were talking about how they used to main Fiora and quit playing her after the rework.

Yeah, the Fiora update made some people stop playing her.  It also made a lot of other people start playing her.

>It wasn't just a new skin to us who actually play her.

Correct, it was an update, not a new skin.

>You ruined the game and it will always be ruined until you change it back.

Considering new Fiora is healthier for the game I don't think that it ruined the game.
You are wrong about most of this.
The death of the 1st E-sport is healthy for the game?

> 
> I have more games with Fiora than all of you combined. 
> 

No you dont. Maybe out of everyone reading this but not in NA.

http://championmasterylookup.derpthemeus.com/champion/?champion=114

dont make outragous claims
Actually ya I do...  Once you consider how many accounts I've had to get from teaching new players how to play.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:35:25.688+0000)
>
> Actually ya I do...  Once you consider how many accounts I've had to get from teaching new players how to play.

So you were permabanned for flaming?

If you try to teach new players how they are playing wrong you are going to get banned several times like me. 

There isn't an account you can hope to save in the long run so don't spend much on skins.
Well I think you see your problem. Doesn't sound like you were being constructive, it sounds like you were being a jerk and expecting them to praise you for it.
Please stop feeding the troll.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=000400000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:45:21.995+0000)
>
> Please stop feeding the troll.

What if you are the troll this time and I am just a guy trying to set the 1st E-sport right again?

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-21T20:07:56.997+0000)
>
> **What if you are the troll this time** and I am just a guy trying to set the 1st E-sport right again?

So you admit to trolling in the past?

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-21T20:15:44.624+0000)
>
> So you admit to trolling in the past?

Riot doesn't like players who don't finish the game...   

People who get 100 kills without winning the match. 

That is what Trolling is.  That is why Riot picked on me and Fiora.

> [{quoted}](name=midnight oil24,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:43:09.245+0000)
>
> Well I think you see your problem. Doesn't sound like you were being constructive, it sounds like you were being a jerk and expecting them to praise you for it.

Can't teach an old dog new tricks... or even the basics of being good for that matter without getting reported.  People would rather report than learn something new that goes against their cookie cutter belief system.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:41:10.602+0000)
>
> If you try to teach new players how they are playing wrong you are going to get banned several times like me. 
> 
> There isn't an account you can hope to save in the long run so don't spend much on skins.

Depending on how you were trying to teach them you could be banned. were you like "skarner buddy i know youre trying but please stop ulting amumu into our team" or based on the fact that you were permabanned i guess you were more like this "SKARNER YOU USELESS PILE OF #### STOP ULTING AMUMU YOU DEFINTION OF A RETARD.

> [{quoted}](name=dolphinosplash24,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=00040000000000000001,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:50:28.093+0000)
>
> Depending on how you were trying to teach them you could be banned. were you like "skarner buddy i know youre trying but please stop ulting amumu into our team" or based on the fact that you were permabanned i guess you were more like this "SKARNER YOU USELESS PILE OF #### STOP ULTING AMUMU YOU DEFINTION OF A RETARD.

I try to teach new players not to talk bad about others. That is a violation of the summoners code.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:41:10.602+0000)
>
> If you try to teach new players how they are playing wrong you are going to get banned several times like me. 
> 
> There isn't an account you can hope to save in the long run so don't spend much on skins.

Hello??!! If you are teaching, legitimately teaching, theres no way you'll get banned.  If you're teaching by flaming or trolling or just being a scumbag then you're getting banned for flaming or trolling or being a scimbag not for trying to help someone learn the game.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:35:25.688+0000)
>
> Actually ya I do...  Once you consider how many accounts I've had to get from teaching new players how to play.

Playing smurf games against other level 10 accounts is hardly Fiora experience that you should flaunt.  Might as well be playing against bots at that point.
My fiora is better than yours.
No one has a better Fiora than me.  This is a false statement.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:36:36.877+0000)
>
> No one has a better Fiora than me.  This is a false statement.

If you want to prove it, you should play ranked and get challenger. That shouldn't be too hard if you're the best at a high skill cap champ that is currently a strong pick in this meta
Only new players play ranked because there are too many dodges.   You never actually get to play the game.
I have a video of one of my games on youtube.  Type in 47 kills with the best Fiora

LOL, your post.

This is really sad.

Oh well.

You know the best way to get back at Riot is to hit them where it hurts. Their wallet.

What I mean is...

######Go Away
Rest in pepperoni

You guys certainly don't care about Fiora like I do. 

You don't even like her or you wouldn't have changed her in the 1st place.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yEDISMnosLM
Can i ask what your age is? Your post intrigued me.

You realize that post rework she has been so much more meta right? Like she is much accessible to a regular game of league than before, when she was almost a troll pick.  Sure ya a new champ, but it's stronger than it was before
She is not stronger she is nerfed badly.  You must be new or a know it all...

I know Fiora has seen much more play competitively, after rework then before rework...she would be considered cheese or kinda troll before that rework now she is legitimately meta and seen very often across not only competitive but actually a large variety of Elos.

But no I must know nothing because I have disagreed with the "Fiora king" or whatever it is you decided to call yourself..

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:10:03.479+0000)

> the 1st E-sport. 

LuL
Well I was #1 in Starcraft 2 in 3 divisions at the same time too.  I have screen shots.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QgQmgvvA,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-03-21T17:37:21.671+0000)
>
> Well I was #1 in Starcraft 2 in 3 divisions at the same time too.  I have screen shots.

Because we're talking about SC2 here...

No one can really argue with me about this and win.   I am better at you guys at the game as well as having an argument.   Everyone who voted negative are just negative trolls. Everyone who said Riot cares more about Fiora are either kidding or very ignorant. 

I think it's clear playing daily for years posting about it all the time that I care more about Fiora. 

I was famous for my level 1 pentakills.   I am better than any player that has ever played the game. 

Someone who actually plays the game instead of just having an opinion loose cannon should matter more.

It's like how all you guys still think surrendering should be allowed in the game. 

You are all wrong.

You are wrong to let them nerf champs in the 1st competitive E-sport.  She is not better.

Take it from the best Fiora of all time.  I was banned from ranked when the reworked my champ because Riot hates both me and Fiora. 

They hate me for actually being good.   

You should give me a little credit for being able to beat any LCS player in history instead of nerfing my main and having a forum for people to laugh at the death of the 1st E-sport.

https://d.justpo.st/media/images/2016/05/02/its-hard-to-win-an-argument-with-a-smart-person-but-its-damn-near-impossible-to-win-an-argument-with-a-stupid-person-bill-murray-1462238033.jpg
I get all these down votes here on the message boards because you guys are all negative people in general I presume but ironically everybody in game seems to agree with me.
The game is no longer fun if there is no champ you can 1vs5 with. Almost certainly all 4 players on your team will be bad and impossible to carry every game you play.
